About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

I'm a promising and passionate software developer who is continuously learning and growing. Over the past two years, I have gained experience by attending a bootcamp and by working on various full stack applications. I have learned the importance of writing highly readable and easily maintainable code, of collaborating with team members, and of creating intuitive and responsive user interfaces. My long-term professional goal is to join my passion for Speech Pathology with my software engineering skills to improve accessibility within healthcare technology. As an opportunist, I truly value problem-solving, creativity, and community. I constantly strive to learn new technologies and continually improve as a developer in this ever- changing industry.

Therapy Mantra

Speech Language Pathologist Assistant

Assist speech-language pathologists in the assessment and treatment of speech, language, voice, and fluency disorders. Implement speech and language programs or activities as planned and directed by speech-language pathologists. Monitor the use of alternative communication devices and systems.

Whole West Coast Spine Restoration Center

Speech Language Pathologist Assistant

Apply techniques to help patients overcome speech impediments, hearing disorders and stuttering. Adjust therapy approaches for patients with autism spectrum disorders.

Whole Child Therapy

Speech Language Pathologist Assistant

Manage scheduling and patient treatment according to insurance and Medicaid guidelines.Provide articulation, language, AAC, and fluency therapy to patients with speech and language needs.
